FuncDef: The display virtual-cluster-access path database all command displays brief path database information of all nodes.
Examples: Maximum Nodes Supported: 2000    Current Total Node Number: 4
Maximum Links Supported: 8000    Current Total Link Number: 6
ID     AP-ID            IGP      Process-ID     Area            Link-Count
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Virtual cluster access uses IS-IS to advertise network topology information. After you configure virtual cluster access, run the display virtual-cluster-access path database command to view path database information collected on nodes.
Prerequisites
Configure virtual-cluster-access.Configure IS-IS and enable IS-IS on interface.Configure virtual-cluster-accesss on interface.
